Module downfall
Package net.dragondelve.ui.editor

Class BuildingsEditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.downfall.ui.editor.BuildingsEditorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StageController
    public final class BuildingsEditorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements StageController
    Controller class for the Buildings Editor. It is responsible for the creation and editing of VisualBuildingTemplates in the current ruleset. Controls /fxml/editors/BuildingsEditor.fxml and is annotated with @FXML where it references that FXML file.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize method that is called automatically after the FXML has finished loading. Initializes all UI elements before they are displayed

      • setStage

        public void setStage​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Lightweight mutator method. Always should be called before the editor is displayed to the user.
        Specified by:
        setStage in interface StageController
        Parameters:
        stage - the stage that is displaying the editor.

      • configureMaterialEditor

        private void configureMaterialEditor​(SimpleTableEditor<Material> editor,
                                     java.lang.String nameColumnTitle,
                                     java.lang.String amountColumnTitle)
        Configures a SimpleTableEditor to have two columns. a Name column that will display the name of its template and an amount column that will display its amount. It makes the amount column editable using TextFieldTableCell and sets up a ConversionFetcher that will generate a new material based on
        Parameters:
        editor - Material editor to be configured.
        nameColumnTitle - title text to be used for the name column
        amountColumnTitle - title text to be used for the amount column

      • unbindBuilding

        private void unbindBuilding​(VisualBuildingTemplate template)
        removes all bindings from a Building Template
        Parameters:
        template - template to be unbound from the textFields

      • displayBuilding

        private void displayBuilding​(VisualBuildingTemplate template)
        binds all properties of the building to GUI TextFields and sets the data of all tables to correspond with the selected template.
        Parameters:
        template - template that was selected by the user to be displayed and edited.
